descriptionParagraphs.name: Short description
content: We can support your organization with your Teams Live Events and Webinars.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Long description
content: Our unique approach helps customer to get confident using Teams Live Events and Webinars. Our goal is to train the organization during the Event Support to get them ready to host the next event by themselves.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business need or problem
content: It’s not easy to convert an On-Premise Event to an Online Event and give the same level of attention to your participants. Communicativ will help you setup the Online Event with years of experience and best practices.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business solution
content:
Our approach focusses on these steps:
  1. IT Readiness Assessment
  2. Organizational Readiness Assessment
  3. Event Scheduling and Production
  4. Organizational support
  5. Temporary Event Equipment

descriptionParagraphs.name: Success factors
content: Through our step-by-step approach we provide 100% successful Live Events with no surprises during production. With our Meeting Space experience, we can facilitate a cost-effective event utilizing available Teams Room solutions or provide temporary Teams Certified equipment to mitigate gaps.

detailItemCategories.name: Resources
